Instruction: Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C) and lightly grease a baking sheet.
Turn the dough out onto a lightly floured surface and knead gently for about 1 minute. Roll the dough into a 1-inch thick rectangle and cut into squares or circles.
Bake in the preheated oven until golden brown, about 12 to 15 minutes.
Bake in the preheated oven until they turn golden brown, about 10 to 15 minutes.
